mapper.select: SELECT botanicals.id, locations.id AS location_id, locations.name AS location_name, botanicals.botanic_cpl, botanicals.botanic_name, botanicals.japanese_name, botanicals.scientific_name, botanicals.genus_name, botanicals.description, botanicals.image_path FROM botanicals JOIN locations ON botanicals.location_id = locations.id
